message.content:
1. Performance on the WCJ-III test may predict listening effort in adults.
2. The WCJ-III test may assist speech-language pathologists (SLPs) in understanding challenges.
3. These challenges are faced by participants when subjected to noise.
4. The WCJ-III test is used in the context of speech-language pathology.

messages.content:
Statement: Performance on the WCJ-III test may predict listening effort in adults and may assist speech-language pathologist (SLPs) to understand challenges faced by participants when subjected to noise.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
